request.description:
Colllections can be used to organize posts together; we can have a bookmark collection to save favorite posts.

note: a collection may be private or public share. the posts within a collection has a share attribute similar to collection that belong to.

item.name: Me - Create Content in a Collection

request.description:
Create a Content In The Collection by Currently Authenticated User.

### Upload Files:
uploading files must directly sent to object-storage then when file successfully uploaded we get hash code in response; we must bind this hash code within post request.

request.description:
Update a post that currently authenticated user has access to edit it.

access can be detrmined by just owner of post.

# note: 
- content-type can`t be changed.
- all media array must sent completely.
- ! all other attribute can be changed.

# exceptions:
- user has no access to edit content.
- content not found.
- content is locked.

## Fields:
- stat: publish|draft
- share: public|private

item.name: Me - List and Filter Content Posts

request.description:
Used to retrieve content(s) by meta attributes.

note: Between Resources That Belong To Owner, Determine By Token.

## Retrieve Specific Post Type
when we want to filter posts by type. exp. show videos

```
?$post=content_type:general
```

## Posts published only for me
```
?$post=stat:publish|share:private
```

## Paginate Result
```
?offset=58e107fa6c6b7a00136318e3&limit=20
```

* offset is mongo object id 

# note:
- posts with share:locked is disabled and will not showing in list.
- users list for likes and comments has limited items to display, for retrieve the full list we can use like and comments endpoint.

response.name: success
success

request.description:
## note:
- only posts with stat publish and share public will attain here.
- when user is owner of a post the draft and private posts also can be retrieved.

## Exceptions:
- Post may be locked.
- Post is not found.
- Post Access Denied.

request.description:
Used to retrieve content(s) by meta attributes.

note: Posts That Belong To @username defined

note: to retrieve data with username that may vary or changed by user we first retrieve uid from server by username then used uid to find posts.

## Retrieve Specific Post Type
when we want to filter posts by type. exp. show videos

```
?$post=content_type:general
```

# note:
- posts with share:locked is disabled and will not showing in list.
- users list for likes and comments has limited items to display, for retrieve the full list we can use like and comments endpoint.
